name: eXtreme MotoCross 2 Free
description:
You enjoyed our Freestyle MotoCross game like almost a million of players accross the world?
Then race as fast as you can and become the best rider in the world in this sequel of our famous Motocross game!
Try to stay on the track and go faster than your opponents but beware of the crash!
Write your name on the Hall Of Fame on our online World Wide HighScore System.
This game is approved by gamers of all ages, from 3+ years old, and up!

★★★ Game Features ★★★

• Very Fast paced MotoCross Race with many tricks to perform
• Really playable by young children from 3 years old and up to 77!
• 3D Graphics and Animations for a realistic race
• Original music from The Almighty Grind
• Unique Game Experience
• Extremely addictive
